en.title: Graphics Journalist, Engineer, Noodle Connoisseur
en.author: Daniel Kao
en.description: I spend my days crunching data and visualizing news stories for the web and mobile devices.

content.value: I spend my days crunching data and visualizing news stories for the web and mobile devices, currently for Commonwealth Magazine. Previously, I was a frontend engineer for the New York Times and The News Lens.

I'm motivated by the idea that digital mediums can help readers better understand complex challenges facing societies today. In addition, I believe that newsrooms are among the most conducive environments to experimentation, development, and creativity.

More broadly, I’m interested in the interplay of technology, politics, journalism, international relations, democracy, and education. My spare time is spent eating noodles, surfing, reading, and traveling.

zh.title: 資料視覺化前端工程師，湯麵愛好者
zh.author: Daniel Kao
zh.description: 當前，我是天下雜誌的前端工程師，專門發想以及製作新聞的視覺化。

content.value: 當前，我是天下雜誌的前端工程師，專門發想以及製作新聞的視覺化。曾任在紐約時報和關鍵評論網當前端工程師。
帶著資工背景進入媒體業，我的初衷是希望運用數位時代的新興技術呈現各種社會複雜的訴求，讓讀者對於切身相關的議題能夠有更好的了解。對他來說，新聞是一個最適合碰撞實驗和創新火花的環境。
此外，我也對科技、政治、國際、民主和教育有興趣。我其他的時間喜歡吃麵、衝浪、看書和旅遊。
